# Vaishnav Portfolio - Copilot Instructions

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.
- [x] Clarify Project Requirements - React + Tailwind CSS portfolio for AI & Cybersecurity professional
- [x] Scaffold the Project - Vite + React + TypeScript template created
- [x] Customize the Project - All components, styles, and data configured
- [ ] Install Required Extensions - Use `npm install` to install dependencies
- [ ] Compile the Project - Run `npm run build` to verify production build
- [ ] Create and Run Task - Use `npm run dev` to start development server
- [ ] Launch the Project - Open http://localhost:3000 in browser
- [ ] Ensure Documentation is Complete - README.md and this file are ready

## Project Overview
- **Type**: React Portfolio Website
- **Framework**: React 18 + TypeScript
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS + Framer Motion
- **Build Tool**: Vite
- **Node Version**: 16+

## Next Steps
1. Run `npm install` to install all dependencies
2. Run `npm run dev` to start the development server
3. Customize `src/data/portfolioData.ts` with your own content
4. Deploy to Vercel, Azure Static Web Apps, or GitHub Pages

## Key Files
- `src/data/portfolioData.ts` - All portfolio content
- `tailwind.config.js` - Tailwind customization
- `src/App.tsx` - Main app component
- `src/components/` - Individual page sections

## Commands
- `npm run dev` - Start dev server
- `npm run build` - Production build
- `npm run preview` - Preview production build
